0: AN ACT CREATING TWO (2) ADDITIONAL DIVISIONS OF THE COURT OF APPEALS IN DAVAO CITY WHICH WILL HANDLE CASES COMING FROM THE ELEVENTH AND TWELFTH JUDICIAL REGIONS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BILANG 129, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980," AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR

House Bill/Resolution NO. HB05868
FULL TITLE : AN ACT CREATING TWO (2) ADDITIONAL DIVISIONS OF THE COURT OF APPEALS IN DAVAO CITY WHICH WILL HANDLE CASES COMING FROM THE ELEVENTH AND TWELFTH JUDICIAL REGIONS, AMENDING FOR THE PURPOSE BATAS PAMBANSA BILANG 129, AS AMENDED, OTHERWISE KNOWN AS THE "JUDICIARY REORGANIZATION ACT OF 1980," AND APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR
